channel.title: Help me get my server no ham!
channel.description: hi people i have just created a server and i cant get it to be non hamatchi i have tried no-ip but that didnt work mayb i did port fowarding rong.....how do i get my server 2 be no hamatchi but HAVE an ip so people can get into it without hamatchi

item.title: Help me get my server no ham!
item.dc:creator: @dr4g0n_sc1m dr4g0n sc1m
item.description:
@dr4g0n_sc1m wrote:

how do i tell if i dont have a router

Read full topic
item.source: Help me get my server no ham!

item.title: Help me get my server no ham!
item.dc:creator: @93dcthugs93 93dcthugs93
item.description:
@93dcthugs93 wrote:

That would mean using No-IP. To port forward look at the guide here or you can look here. If you don’t have a router… then just download No-IP DUC and check the box next to your DNS server on the No-IP screen.

If there isn’t a DNS server there then you need to make one. Set up an account at No-IP

Set up a DNS server and such, don’t change anything just make a name. After that, restart No-IP DUC & then your DNS server should be listed, check the box next to it.

If you’ve port forwarded correctly and such, you should be able to connect with the DNS server you set up. Compile & Run your server.

Read full topic
item.source: Help me get my server no ham!
